entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Medicine Hat Airport 1:00 PM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023

Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 90 %

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 11 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023
